entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 01 January 2023
